LanguageData.GlitterNet.EnableSystemWake_desc: System Wake is a storyline for GlitterNet. If you would like this storyline to be present in your game, enable this setting. This setting can be changed any time during a game.
LanguageData.GlitterNet.EnableThermalManagement_desc: If thermal management is enabled, GlitterNet hubs, processors, and specialized processors will produce heat and have maximum operating temperatures. It's recommended to play with anoher mod that adds more advanced temperature control if you want to enable thermal management. This setting can be changed any time during a game.
LanguageData.GlitterNet.ShutoffTemperature_desc: The temperature devices shut down at, in celsius, if thermal management is enabled.
LanguageData.GlitterNet.HeatProductionMultiplier_desc: The heat produced by devices is scaled by this value, as a percentage, if thermal management is enabled.
